txt.en: Brangil can be found in Tinnudir.\n\nYou should speak with Brangil.
The nefarious forces of Angmar travel to Evendim in search of powerful artifacts, including Tárlug, who knows only to serve the Angmarim's will.
Tárlug can be found somewhere in Evendim.\n\nYou should defeat Tárlug.

'The Angmarim have brought a massive Gorthorog to Evendim. Tárlug is completely loyal to the Angmarim. He will carry out any of their orders without hesitation. I believe that this beast is helping the Angmarim discover and plunder tombs. We must stop their efforts before any more powerful artifacts are unearthed.'
'We Rangers thank you for your efforts. May we soon chase the last of the Angmarim out of Annúminas and reseal the cities ancient tombs.'
